description: Demolition of existing two-storey house and construction of two detached two-storey dwellings; alterations and extensions to existing detached studio in rear garden to form one new single-storey dwelling with extensions to front and southern side (following demolition of shed); associated parking and landscaping. (Total of three dwellings).
decision_conditions: 1.   The proposal represents an undesirable overdevelopment of the site at a density that does not reflect the character of the surrounding area and which would result in a cramped development harmful to the living conditions of existing and future occupants of the site and in the locality. As such, the proposal is contrary to policies 4.1 and 5.5 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
